This technique allows Sasuke to [[Chakra Flow|channel]] the [[Chidori]] through his [[Sword of Kusanagi (Sasuke Uchiha)|chokutō]]. This makes it nearly unblockable as the radiating and chirping blade can easily cut through steel. Furthermore, if an opponent is stabbed, their body goes numb due to an electrical current which causes the muscles to contract, making it impossible for the opponent to move. However, it can be countered by other weapons that also utilise Lightning Release chakra flow, such as [[Killer B]]'s [[Supervibrato Lightning Release Swords|flowed]] [[Kumogakure Swords|swords]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 411, page 17</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In the ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja (series)|Ultimate Ninja Storm]]'' series, this technique is simply referred to as '''Chidori Katana'''.
* In the crossover comic series ''[[Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles x Naruto]]'', [[Kakashi]] performs a [[cooperation ninjutsu]] with [[w:c:turtlepedia:Leonardo (TMNT x Naruto)|Leonardo]] resembling this technique, called '''Lightning Katana''', utilising the [[Lightning Cutter]].<ref>''Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles x Naruto'' Issue 3, page 18</ref>
